title: Corpsegrinder
content:
When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Reliable and trustworthy, you could not hope for more respectable company than this maul whilst traversing the forlorn places of the world.

Corpsegrinder is one of the Maul Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Corpsegrinder is a mighty maul that adds thunder damage to your attacks and can push enemies away in an area. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Fi
